story.author: MarinatedTuna

msg.content:
Welcome! Thank you for downloading Seen: Repressed! üòÅ Please choose one of five options!
Update scheduled on 06/22/17!

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2200,You never told Nic what Mike asked you to do...,!SpLiT!,1750,You haven't talked to her for weeks...,!SpLiT!,2500,Nic keeps on rejecting his calls while you keep accepting favors...,!SpLiT!,2000,But you believe there's still hope...

msg.content: Mark we need to talk

reply.content: Talk about what?

msg.content: I feel weird about you
Past weeks you were like trying to hold my hand
Tell me Mark are you trying to pick me up?

reply.content: Well I thought I could

msg.content: You're changing dude
Just please don't add up to my problems

reply.content: I apologize Nic

msg.content: You!! You're such a terrib..
I'm sorry Mark. I don't mean to be rude but..
I just want you to come back. The real you

reply.content: But I'm the real me, Nic

msg.content: You.. you aren't
The real Mark talks to me....
Not this Mark who tries to hold my hand like a creep
The real Mark is.. he's.. cheerful and supportive and...
Mark I miss you. Please come back üòî

reply.content: I'll do my best

msg.content: I just want my bestfriend back I mean
We're still bestfriends right?

reply.content: Yeah

msg.content: Really?
Then why can't I feel it Mark?
Tell me.. why?!

reply.content: Why can't you love me?

msg.content: I.. I don't know.
Mark why can't you just accept it?

reply.content: I feel there's still hope.

msg.content: There's none probably. I told you already..
I guess I have to give you more time...
To accept all of this...
Mark. Can I still trust you? üòî

reply.content: Yes

msg.content: I trust you too...

reply.content: Nic can I tell you something?

msg.content: What is it?

reply.content: I am so sorry I've been acting weird lately. We've been great friends ever since you first started talking to me over text about chemistry

msg.content: I know and that's what I miss about you Mark.
You were so bright and cheerful and supportive around me.
And I feel like I'm slowly losing you day after day.
You have to understand Mark. You don't need to be in a relationship to be happy

reply.content: It just hurts y'know? You're the first girl I ever confessed to and I had high expectations
But I've learned a lot from you Nic. We have so much in common. It's so easy to get along with you.
You've made my life much more interesting and easier to bear when I had problems. I guess that's kinda why I fell in love with you.
I know you're mad at me because of all these weeks I've been ignoring you and begging you to love me back and I deserve it.
I know I have to accept things. It's just been hard y'know?

msg.content: Look Mark. You don't have to be so apologetic.
Maybe I've been blunt and apathetic over the past weeks. I should've at least sympathized with you but I've been shutting you out too.
See this is why I don't like the idea of love. Or at least I want to avoid the thought for now.
Mike hurt me. I hurt you. Love does nothing but ruin friendships.
We would've been talking normally if it wasn't for love. We'd still be best friends

reply.content: No it's okay Nic. ‚ò∫
You broke up with someone you thought was worth loving and even though it's been 3 months, maybe you just want to take a break.
And I'm completely fine with that Nic. I want to take a break too. There's so many areas in my life I need to improve.
I'm done chasing girls and feeling desperate and needy. I should just enjoy life and you should too.

msg.content: Well I'm glad we're okay now Mark. ‚ò∫
I just want to focus on myself too. I feel like I've spent too much time trying to look for guys too.
Maybe I just need to stop thinking about dating and enjoy life.
Because life is so short and we should just make the most out of it without depending on other people for happiness.
I don't want change. I just want to focus on what I'm already happy with. I don't want to feel like I'm lacking nor do I want to seaech for more than I already have.

reply.content: You're right Nic. I don't want anything to change between us. I just want to be comfortable about you being my bestfriend. ‚ò∫
And I know it's hard for me to let this thought sink in but what's the difference with being bestfriends and being lovers anyways?
We already trust each other enough to tall about our deepest, darkest secrets. We run to each other when we need support. And we're always so excited to tell each other about our days. ‚ò∫
Come to think of it, it's as if we're still lovers anyways. üòÇ

msg.content: Hahaha! üòÇ
You do have a point. üòõ
Wow I'm so relieved everything feels so normal and comfortable between us now.
Just ten minutes ago, I felt very uncomfortable talking to you and I was very aware of the fact that we may have broken ties altogether if your persistence continued.
I really respect you for finally stopping your pursuit. ‚ò∫ I have a feeling that you've had a thing for me for quite a while now.
I feel bad rejecting you. It sucks being the one friendzoned I know. I just hope that the next girl you like will be ready and be as eager to date as you.

reply.content: I'll get over it eventually. I guess it's easier to get over all this if we stay friends.

msg.content: It really depends actually.
Take it from me. Based on my past experience, I always found it easier to stop talking to the guy I liked if we were in a relationship and we just broke up
If I stayed friends, I'd still be emotionally attached to the guy, even if we weren't trying to get back together.

In the short term it really does hurt. Not seeing the person you loved and dated. I know that in past relationships I've had, I'd spend at least 30 minutes everyday crying before going to sleep and even more if I wake up in the middle of the night somehow.

reply.content: Really? I can't imagine how that actually feels like. I always thought leaving the girl I liked would leave me more depressed in the long run.
How many guys have you dated in the past?

msg.content: Well unofficially, 3 guys but if I were to have an official count, 2.

reply.content: I don't get it. Can you define officially and unofficially? üòÇ

msg.content: Read between the lines my friend. üòõ

reply.content: Uh.. okay fine. One of the guys was a hookup and then you broke off after you had a one night stand.

msg.content: LOL what?? You crazy! üòÇ
I'm not really into that Mark. Cmon now. üòõ

Y'know what? I'll just tell you. üòÇ The guy I considered dating was kind of a total wimp. I thought he was interesting so I really started talking to him but then I found out he was kind of weak in his own skin. He was lazy, unhygenic, unmotivated, and just not really as lively as I thought in general. In the end, he wasn't really someone worth pursuing so I just stopped talking to him.

reply.content: Well you have high standards now don't you? üòõ

msg.content: I guess you could say that.

reply.content: And now I can't help but ask..
How many guys have you rejected Nic?

msg.content: Umm...
If I remember correctly, probably about 4 guys, not counting the ones I dated or you. üòõ
Well it gets easier knowing what you really look for in a guy/girl after some past experience.
If ya know what I mean üòâ

reply.content: LOL üòÇ Oh you definitely have a lot of experience if that's what you're implying.
This is what I miss about you Nic. You always have dirty jokes, especially when we chat late at night. Everything just feels so normal now.

msg.content: Hahaha! üòÇ You're one of the only few guys I know of that really enjoy my weird humor
But for real though, I'm not all about that life. üòõ I have standards y'know?
Sure, guys want to date me because they want to eventually get into my pants.
But you can't just date a girl because of her looks. While good looks are definitely a plus, what's on the inside counts much more.

reply.content: "What's on the inside." üòâ

msg.content: Dammit Mark! üòÇ I'm trying to be serious right now.
Anyways, if you're dating me, you sure as hell better be interesting and we gotta have things in common and sentimental experiences to share.
Because if you're just in a relationship to hookup, it's really not worth it. There's no feelings at all and it feels.... too robotic imo.

reply.content: For a girl who's never hooked up with a guy before, you speak as if you have experience. üòÆ

msg.content: Nah nah...
I speak from observation
I remember one of my girl friends who was so into hooking up with other guys. üòÇ
Rumors would go around that this girl would hook up with random guys at least once a month. üòÇ
Sometimes I'd feel bad for her reputation but what can she do? Word will always go out when an interesting event becomes a great story.

reply.content: Oh my god Nic üòÇ How do you know about all this? I've never about it happen at our school before.

msg.content: Nah that's because this all took place at the park. I go there a lot just because that's where she usually likes to scoodilypoop üòõ

reply.content: Scoodily what?

msg.content: It's just a fancy way of saying hooking up. üòÇ You can credit my mom for that word.
Oh gosh. I can still remember the car jumping up and down. And all those creaking noises üòÇ

reply.content: LOL üòÇ I can imagine it so clearly. And I can only assume that you were recording with a group right Nic?

msg.content: YES
I posted some videos on snapchat. I didn't get a view of both of them but you can tell from all the noises it was them. üòÇ

reply.content: I don't like snapchat to be honest. üòÇ A waste of time for me in my opinion. But I think now I need to reconsider.

msg.content: Haha! üòÇ It's a good time waster though. There's always that one guy who posts something so stupid or hilarious.

reply.content: By the way, this girl you keep mentioning. I bet I know who she is.
Is it Jenny? üòÇ

msg.content: As much as I want to say she is, she ain't all about that life.
She's just.. I don't know... A lying bsckstabber. üòÇ
Anyways, you don't know who she is probably but she's in my PE class.
Elizabeth DeWitt ring a bell?

reply.content: Nope. Never heard of her.
Y'know sometimes I think you're secretly into that kind of stuff and you're not telling me. I bet this is all relatable to you. üòÇ

msg.content: Stoooop! üòÇ
How can anyone relate to that? Tell me. üòõ Most people have standards and decency.

reply.content: Calm down Nic. üòõ I know you're not into that stuff I was just messing with ya
I know you're a classy girl. You're mostly reserved and focused with chemistry especially.

msg.content: You right. You right. üòé
Don't be trashy! Keep it classy! üòâ

reply.content: LOL üòÇ That's so good Nic. Where'd you come up with it?

msg.content: I'm just so creative y'know. üòå
Okay I think I've talked about THAT enough for today. üòÇ
Going back to what we talked about earlier today. Love is not all about getting in a girl's pants, looking for happiness from someone else, or looking cool in front of all your friends.
It's all about finding the girl you really love and y'know what the best part about love is? It's all about the fact that it comes when you least expect it.
Take it from me. I personally believe that the hottest thing I can find in a guy is ambition, drive, passion, dominance, and a good sense of humor. üòâ

reply.content: Drive and passion especially. üòâ

msg.content: Yup... üòÇ
When you focus only on yourself, you'll become a better developed, more well-rounded person and girls will come flocking towards you. üòâ "Mark" my words.

reply.content: That cheeeese though. üòÇ Yeah I'll definitely remember your advice Nic.
I'm glad we became friends. I'm glad I fell in love with you Nic. ‚ò∫ Because if it wasn't for that, I never would've invested so much time getting to know you better.

I want our friendship to continue. You have a great sense of humor, I'm never bored around you, and all your crazy chemistry experiments always surprise me in a good way. And your pranks especially. I'll cherish these memories for as long as I'm alive. ‚ò∫

msg.content: You're trying to make me cry arent'cha? üò≠
I started tearing up when I read your last message. üòÇ
I know I've said this earlier but I'm glad we're bestfriends again Mark. ‚ò∫ Thank you so much. I truly respect what you did today. Best of luck in your love life and best of luck to me as well!

reply.content: Your welcome Nic. ‚ò∫ Man it feels so good being able to talk to you again normally. You're right. Screw love! It's all about enjoying life with people you care about.

msg.content: Exactly! üòâ
See sometimes love clouds reasoning. Sometimes you think it's love that you're feeling when in reality it's really something else.
Sometimes you feel like you have no control over yourself because you're too weak to resist.
Or that it's sooo addicting that you keep unwillingly coming back for more.
That's why it's best to avoid love because of how painful it can be. ‚ò∫

reply.content: What do you mean by it's so addicting?
What do you mean you keep 'unwillingly' coming back for more?
Nic?

msg.content: I have to go Mark. I'm kinda tired now. Goodnight!

reply.content: Goodnight Nic.

condition.then:
FADE_ADV,0,5000,Seen: Repressed
A Seen Collaboration!
Join the Seen Discord! üòÅ
discord.gg/AKW6nqb,!SpLiT!,5000,Coming Soon!

msg.content: end

chapter.chdesc: Romulus Blythe to the rescue! But what if the central narrative conflict isn't about Mark Blythe being friendzoned? That'd be crazy lol

msg.content: Yooo Mark!

reply.content: Oh hey Rommie...

msg.content: You've been up so late at night for the past few days. What's keeping you awake?

reply.content: Idk man. I just kinda have nagging feelings still but I keep telling myself that I shouldn't because we were never even a thing to begin with.

msg.content: So it's this all over again is it lil guy?

reply.content: I just can't get over it no matter how hard I try I mean...

Why should I be sad about this friendzone when people have had worse in relationships? I've heard stories of people breaking up after a four year relationship or divorce after ten years of marriage! My situation means nothing compared to that!

msg.content: Cmon man! Never tell yourself that you should repress your emotions! Even if you weren't in a relationship, you still had feelings. You still tried to pursue her and she rejected you. Don't ever think you shouldn't be able to feel upset over your encounter because you think your situation isn't as bad as a breakup! Allow yourself to process the situation so that you can eventually get over her.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,3000,(But then my feelings would get in the way of our friendship...),!SpLiT!,2000,You told yourself to process the hurt from rejection...,!SpLiT!,3000,But you just couldn't cry no matter how hard you tried...,!SpLiT!,3000,(Have I already moved on?...)

reply.content: Well I've already cried about it the first three days after she rejected me. Maybe it's just lingering emotions? Idk.

msg.content: Well it's been a month since she rejected you... Do you feel like you're getting closer to getting over her?

reply.content: I don't know to be honest. It's kind of on and off. And I find myself wanting to just lay in my bed, doing nothing but staring at the ceiling.

msg.content: Dude that's dangerous.

reply.content: What do you mean? Why?

msg.content: By keeping yourself idle and doing nothing, you're allowing yourself to have dark thoughts infiltrate your mind. And that'll only prolong the process of getting over her. It's a nasty cycle to be in.

reply.content: Well, I guess you're right about that. Sometimes I think I've gotten over her one day and then the next day, she's running through my mind and I keep thinking what we could've been had I said something differently, had I done something differently, or that maybe I still might get a second chance someday...

msg.content: Here lemme tell you how to speed up the process: You're hurt, you're overanalyzing the past, and you're caught in this endless cycles of sadness and what-if's. If you really want to get over her, use this time as an opportunity to try new things. Focus on developing yourself so that you can keep your mind off her. It's hard at first because you're tempted to think about her.

reply.content: You're right. I've been too stubborn to do anything else productive. I've never thought about it really. I believed that analyzing our conversations would help me. But I would always find myself with more questions and going back to square one.

msg.content: I feel you man. See that's why you can't move on. Your mind is always on about her whenever you're given the chance. Even though it's inevitable that you'll be thinking about her, moving on is much easier if you're always busy. And there will be a point in time when you'll stop thinking about her and you won't even realize it. It just happens.

reply.content: I hope so. I just want to be through this already. I used to feel so sad after being friendzoned but now this nagging feeling is just annoying. I just want to talk to her as a friend without being reminded that we can't be a thing...

msg.content: Well you've already tried ignoring her over the past month so the best thing you can do for now is just to keep yourself busy and stop asking yourself about what could've been and why it ended up the way it is today.

reply.content: Thanks man. I'll take your word and hope for the best.

msg.content: One last question before I get back to work: Are you guys on good terms now?

reply.content: Yeah. We are now thankfully. I just realized how close I was in pushing her away. I'm just glad we're still friends and that I always have someone to laugh with and share crazy chemistry experiments with.

msg.content: That's great to hear man! It seems like you've moved on already but you just need to get over her before finding someone else.

Anyways, remember this: Your guys' friendship is amazing. Don't ever stop talking to her and be there for her when she needs you. Use this as a learning experience so that you'll be able to do better with your next encounter. But other than that, that's all! Best of luck to you lil' guy! If you ever need anything, just hit me up and we can talk!

reply.content: Aight for sure man! Thanks for your advice. I think I can sleep now. I'll try my best not to think about her. And also, one more thing...

msg.content: Oh it's nothing man! That's what family is for!
Sure! What is it?

reply.content: We should practice piano tomorrow. It's been 2 years since I last played and I wanna see myself get better at it.

msg.content: Of course man! I'll hook you up with easy sheet notes and we'll move up the ladder from there! We'll start practicing tomorrow. Hope you haven't forgotten your basic notes

reply.content: Sounds good! And of course I haven't forgotten. How could I forget something so easy? Haha

msg.content: Good. Alright I'll sign off now. Night man!

reply.content: Night!

msg.content: Mark! Guess what? üòÜ

reply.content: You hooked up with someone! üòè

msg.content: Totally! üòÇ For real though, here's what happened. So I texted my cousin's gf right? She's a chem major so I asked her to mail me two things since it's free. Guess what they were?

reply.content: Radioactive waste? Idk. üòÇ

msg.content: Nope!
I asked Evelyn for liquid nitrogen and diethyl ether! üòÇ

reply.content: Damn Nic! üòÇ What are you planning to do with those?

msg.content: I'm gonna set the pool on fire with diethyl ether and then put it out with liquid nitrogen! üòÇ Oh man... mom and dad would be pissed if they find out! Good thing they're not home.

reply.content: So this is the chem project you've been talking about. Seriously though, watch yourself! üòÆ

msg.content: Hey dude! Stop worrying! üòÜ I know how to deal with accidents like these.

reply.content: What? Nic are you telling me you screwed around and blew something up?

msg.content: Nah nah

I just know how to deal with these things. I've seen youtubers with their own crazy chemistry experiments. üòÇ Like they've had their own accidents before. Some get pretty nasty while other are just plain hilarious.

reply.content: Just please don't burn down your house Nic. üòÖ What you're doing seems way too dangerous. Are you doing this by yourself?

msg.content: Dude I got this! No need to worry man! üòâ
And this is just the first part of my experiment too so prepare for surprises in chemistry class on Friday. üòè

reply.content: You serious Nic? üòÇ What else are you doing?

msg.content: OH
I'm not telling you Mark üòõ I'm totally going to surprise you.

reply.content: Oh cmon Nic. üòÇ I'm your bestfriend. At least give me a hint.

msg.content: Ugh! Fine. üòõ Let's just say my chem teacher would be impressed. I'll be demonstrating a concept he's never taught us in class before.

reply.content: I have a feeling what you'll be doing is dangerous. Please do take care of yourself Nic. I'm being serious now.

msg.content: Dude! You really have nothing to worry about alright? üòÇ I promise it's not dangerous.
Oh gosh! I just remembered! Something crazy happened with Jenny today üòÇ

reply.content: With Jenny? What do you mean? You guys are talking to each other again?

msg.content: Nah nah I still hate her ass üòõ
Jenny hooked up with some guy from another school in the boy's bathroom üòÇ

reply.content: What? Already? üòÇ I legit thought that she was going out with Mike.

msg.content: end
virtual void MarinatedTuna() const = 0;
What were you expecting? An easter egg? Fine here's one for ya üòÇ

Seen: Repressed WILL use PLAY_SOUND and TIMED_MSG on June 12, 2017 once Polychroma Games updates Seen. It's Seen's first anniversary on that day so hope you enjoy Seen: Repressed as I'm working through it! üòÅ
I tried to say no...
I said I wasn't ready for it...
@expr+ Nicole's voice began to waver
I tried to fight back...
@expr+ Nicole burst into tears and fell on the grass

story.desc:
In this alternate universe, the ending of chapter 4 in the original Seen has been completely altered. What if in an alternate scenario, Mark Blythe does NOT force Nicole Tyler to love him back? What if, for some reason, although clearly unmeta from the original Seen story, Mark and Nicole stay friends? The car accident never happens and therefore no amnesia. Life's all good! Until...
Official Beta Release 0:
- Chapter One released and completed! - New premise and back story revealed! (05/23/2017)
Major Update 1:
- Chapter Two reveal! - Non-meta Seen character added! (05/31/2017)
story.name: Seen: Repressed
